argument: This is all right. The tent has been set up!
message.name: Nadeshiko

argument: Then, do you play with Chikuwa?
message.name: Rin

argument: And? I got inside the tent.
message.name: Nadeshiko

argument: This is the time like this. snack!
message.name: Ena

argument: Come out Chikuwa. It's a snack.
message.name: Ena

argument: Yes, Nadeshiko-chan. Take this and run.
message.name: Ena

argument: It's a big dog and a small dog chasing after
message.name: Rin

argument: Then, in the meantime, I'm in the tent ...
message.name: Ena

argument: I'm taking a nap in the tent.
message.name: Rin

argument: You're thirsty. Which is better, water or
message.name: Rin

argument: Well, the sweetness permeates all over the
message.name: Nadeshiko

argument: It would be nice if the dog could move around
freely if it was this wide.

argument: I think so. Chikuwa looked happy too.

argument: Now, let's get ready for dinner soon.
